text: The King Will Come is a live album by rock band Wishbone Ash. ==Track listings== #"Rest in Peace" #"The King Will Come" (originally appeared on Argus) #"Half Past Love" #"Rock 'n' Roll Widow" #"Time Was" (originally appeared on Argus) #"Ballad of the Beacon" #"Warrior" (originally appeared on Argus) #"Throw Down the Sword" (originally appeared on Argus) #"Blowin' Free" (originally appeared on Argus) #"Doctor" Category:1999 live albums Category:Wishbone Ash live albums
title: The King Will Come
